name: The 2nd International Conference on Biodiversity and Environmental Management 2021
content: The 2nd International Conference on Biodiversity and Environmental Management 2021 invites you to submit your research papers and case studies on or before 15th August 2021 to present online. The conference theme is “Mainstreaming Biodiversity; Sustaining People and their Livelihoods” The following are the conference tracks for abstract submission. Biodiversity and Wildlife Forestry and Ecology Waste Management Climate Change Environmental economics Green technologies Aquatic ecosystems Ethnobiology and Environment Law Environmental Microbiology Environmental Pollution Covid and Environment Please click this link for more information https://bemconferences.com/call-for-papers/
